reviews.review: Очень хорошая игра, как для тебя одного, так и для игры с другом.
good gaem, twice the portal, twice the amogus
单人剧情通关成功，搞FPS起家的V社用FPS的另一种玩法为我们展开了一段奇妙的冒险。建模和优化都十分优秀，声优的发音和说话的节奏都让人感到清爽不拖沓，游戏模式和剧情搭配的几乎完美无缺，游戏性极强，特别是多人合作模式，没有合作，乐趣就少了一大半。唯一美中不足的地方是：电脑语言是二进制的，而V社却用3进制编程。
Incredible puzzle game, if you enjoy a nice game with good puzzles, this is definitly a must play game
Great story paired with great music. Fantastic game for PC Gaming Beginners!
One of the best single player games I have ever played. Period. Multiplayer is also an absolute blast with friends. Play it.

Postal 2 is a violent game that follows the misadventures of a man named "The Postal Man."
This game has been subject to many controversies due to its graphic and unapologetic content.

Postal 2 is the one game in the postal series that has received the most backlash.

This game allows you to commit extreme acts of violence, and is definitely meant for a much older audience.
Se tiver um amigo para jogar, vale cada centavo

o~kei。单人通关，必须承认有几关看了攻略，当你卡关时，请关闭，下次再来。
好玩好玩好玩，可惜没朋友hhh，找汉化补丁打上，那样初入steam的会感到剧情也很不错（英语大佬请忽略）。
夏促刚入steam（我的钱包啊555。。。。），买了这个，确实值得买值得玩值得你花钱。
最后，土豆服务器可还行0.0
Very fun to play, gets the rain juices flowing. Highly recommend!

this game is great I've played this a lot over the years and its fun to play with your friends on co op mode there is a lot of content to play and stuff to look at in the menu there is also a mode where you can make your own levels play and post them 
and there is plenty of ester eggs in the game to keep you busy the story and characters are great. but some levels are hard and there is some glitches that are funny and some are frustrating but over all i would recommend this fun puzzle game
Un buen juego de puzzles, recomendado
One of the best games I played in the last two decades
Хорошая игра. На несколько вечеров пойдет. Рекомендую

A fantastic puzzle game, but more importantly, an achievement for cinematic gaming that still hasn't been surpassed, in my opinion. The concept from Portal 1 returns: use your Portal Gun to shoot orange and blue portals on to any eligible "gray" surface and you can jump in between the two locations instantly. This time, there are a few new tricks in the level design to give new possibilities to the game-play, including a mechanism for super-speed and a mechanism for low-gravity.

More importantly, the funny and charming script and surrounding lore of the first adventure is expanded upon, taking you further into the depths of Aperture Science while simultaneously taking the player on a tour of the facility's past. While the player character remains mute, the franchise-defining villain GladOS returns and Stephen Merchant and JK Simmons play new characters who will both guide you on your journey and reveal secrets of Aperture's past. The reason I say above that the game is such an incredible cinematic gaming experience is that over the course of its few hours, the story takes you on a ride that could honestly rival that of a Pixar movie. With the great performances of the Hollywood actors above, the fantastic animation of Wheatley and GladOS, and the awe-inspiring design of the Aperture Facility by Valve's team, this game is truly one of the best ever, and it's hard to see it ever being topped.
seru cuy, enak kali masuk portal sana sini
very fun multiplayer game. i also like the level builder.

I barely feel in space after beating a game. and this one is one of them. Not suprised to this game's metacritic point and being steam's most recommended game. Absolutely wonderful.
Honestly I was about to give this game 9/10 but I can't find anything to break that 1 point. So this is my 4th 10/10 game.
10/10

[b]10/10[/b]

Portal 2 is just great. It has a great story, great, sometimes quite hard, puzzles and a great graphic, especially for this price. There is a wide variety of Puzzles that are sometimes easy, sometimes challenging. If you listen to the story, you´ll quickly fall in Love with it. A thing that you also have to put into consideration is the still great graphic, sound design, gameplay and the possibility to play in singleplayer and co-op mode. The co-op mode is also very fun, and of course, challenging. 

Overall I have to say that this game is GREAT!
I would recommend it 100%

Mein Absolut und unbestrittener Top Favorit unter den Multiplayer Games. Racing und Shooter liegt einem oder nicht aber das ist ein Spiel für jeder man!!! Besonder für Pärchen empfehle ich den Multiplayer Modus. Fantastisch meine frau und ich lieben es.

Mayormente mis reseñas son súper formales , con vocabulario ejemplar y 100% objetivo. Pero necesito despojarme de todo esto para hacer esta reseña , quiero ser 100% autentico con lo que pensaba de este juego y lo que siento ahora.

Cuando lo compré , pensé que era una basurita por el precio que tenía , que era un juego del montón . En las rebajas compré el 1 y el 2, y como vi que eran baratos y cortos me mandé.
El 1 me gustó hasta ahí , pero el 2... DIOS
es una obra maestra chabon , qué haces que todavía no te lo compras ?.
No hay un juego parecido en todo steam , es súper atrapante , desafiante , divertido.
Sin dudas para mi no va a ser un juego más , lo súper disfruté de principio a fin. 
Las mecánicas excelentes , la música también , el ending del final es simplemente genial. 
No lo pienses, compra los 2 , el 1 es medio densuli a comparación de este , pero valen 100% la pena. Realmente lo están regalando al precio que se encuentra.
Tiene que estar en tu biblioteca si o si maestro , no te vas a arrepentir

100% recomendado, si no te convencí con esto ,es porque todavía usas un pentium 2 y no lo podes correr (?
